title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: The Godfather Part II
plot: The continuation of the Corleone saga as Michael Corleone becomes the patriarch of the organized crime dynasty.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his partners in the criminal enterprise.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives for his killings.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Green Mile
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat.

title: The Lion King
plot: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to discover the truth about his past.

title: Back to the Future
plot: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend.

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Prestige
plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: The Sixth Sense
plot: A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with ghosts seeks the help of an intervention specialist.

title: American Beauty
plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman is forced out of exile with the emergence of a new terrorist leader.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit inherits a mysterious ring and must travel across Middle-earth to destroy it.

title: Star Wars: Episode V
plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse.

title: Memento
plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer using notes and tattoos.

title: Seven Samurai
plot: Seven samurai are hired by villagers to protect their village from bandits.

title: Singin' in the Rain
plot: A silent film star must convince his estranged partner to help him rework an upcoming musical.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
plot: An angel shows a financially troubled businessman what his town would have been like if he had never been born.

title: Sunset Boulevard
plot: A desperate screenwriter and a faded film star engage in a dark obsession.

title: Psycho
plot: A woman is murdered in a motel bathroom, and a private detective is hired to solve the case.

title: Casablanca
plot: A cynical American cafe owner in Casablanca reluctantly helps his old flame and her husband escape the Nazis.

title: Vertigo
plot: A retired San Francisco detective obsesses over the disappearance of a woman who resembles his client's wife.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired to retrieve the lost Ark of the Covenant.

title: Jaws
plot: When a giant great white shark begins hunting swimmers on the New England coast, the police chief takes action.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
plot: A phone home is the only hope for an alien stranded on Earth to return to his mother ship.

title: The Shining
plot: A family isolated in an island hotel during the winter is influenced by an evil presence to commit violent acts.

title: Alien
plot: The crew of a commercial spacecraft is awakened to engage with an extraterrestrial creature.

title: Blade Runner
plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in an attempt to escape.

title: Double Indemnity
plot: An insurance salesman and a femme fatale plot the murder of her husband.

title: The Big Sleep
plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired to solve a blackmail case in 1940s Los Angeles.

title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
plot: A romantic comedy about a young woman of mysterious background who tries to marry a rich man.

title: Rear Window
plot: A photographer with a broken leg witnesses a potential murder in a neighboring apartment.

title: The Great Dictator
plot: An exiled dictator and a Jewish barber, both lookalikes, must switch places to make a difference in the world.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
plot: An outlaw, a drifter, and a widow conspire to rescue a town from a corrupt railroad tycoon.

title: Citizen Kane
plot: A reporter investigates the past of wealthy newspaper mogul Charles Foster Kane.

title: Rear Window
plot: A photographer with a broken leg witnesses a potential murder in a neighboring apartment.

title: Mulholland Drive
plot: After a car accident on the Mulholland Drive, an amnesiac woman and an aspiring actress embark on a mysterious journey.

title: Trainspotting
plot: A group of Scottish misfits attempt to escape their addictions and the inanities of society around them.

title: The Bicycle Thieves
plot: In postwar Rome, a man searches for his stolen bicycle which is essential for his livelihood.

title: Inglourious Basterds
plot: In Nazi-occupied France, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of American soldiers emerges.

title: Toy Story
plot: A cowboy doll is threatened when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as the top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot: The life of British officer T.E. Lawrence and his involvement in the Middle East during World War I.

title: The Apartment
plot: A lonely office worker borrows his boss's apartment to impress a woman, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: The Third Man
plot: A writer investigates the mysterious death of his friend in post-war Vienna.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
plot: An assassin wakes from a coma and seeks revenge on those who tried to kill her.

title: In the Mood for Love
plot: Two neighbors discover that their respective spouses are having an affair and bond in a mysterious way.

title: The Gold Rush
plot: A drifter joins the Yukon Gold Rush in search of fortune and romance.

title: Harakiri
plot: A samurai seeks revenge against the clan responsible for his son's death.

title: Oppenheimer
plot: A biography of the American physicist who led the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

title: The French Connection
plot: Two detectives pursue drug traffickers from New York to France.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
plot: A fading actor and his stunt double navigate Hollywood in the 1960s.

title: Requiem for a Dream
plot: The lives of four people spiral into despair as they struggle with different addictions.

title: The Thing
plot: A group of men at an Antarctic research station fight for survival against a shape-shifting alien.

title: Stalker
plot: A guide takes a writer and a professor through a mysterious, restricted zone to find a room that grants wishes.

title: M
plot: A serial killer of children terrorizes a German city, prompting citizens and criminals to hunt him down.

title: All About Eve
plot: An aging theater actress is threatened by an ambitious younger actress.

title: Anatomy of a Murder
plot: A lawyer defends an army officer accused of murdering a man who allegedly assaulted his wife.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
plot: An aging test pilot mentors a new generation of fighters and confronts his past.

title: The Hunt
plot: A schoolteacher faces false accusations of child abuse in a small Danish village.

title: Dial M for Murder
plot: A man plans a murder using a clever scheme involving blackmail and deception.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
plot: A lawyer defends a man accused of murder with help from a mysterious witness.

title: Ratatouille
plot: A talented rat who dreams of becoming a chef forms an unlikely alliance with a garbage boy in Paris.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
plot: Three returning World War II veterans readjust to civilian life and face unexpected challenges.

title: Monsters, Inc.
plot: A monster scarer discovers that laughter is more powerful than screams in generating energy.

title: Some Like It Hot
plot: Two musicians witness a mob hit and disguise themselves as members of an all-girl band.

title: Toy Story 4
plot: Woody must lead the toys on an adventure to find Forky and reunite him with Bonnie.

title: Jurassic Park
plot: A theme park featuring prehistoric dinosaurs is forced to shut down when the creatures escape.

title: Finding Nemo
plot: A timid clownfish searches for his captured son with help from an amnesiac fish.

title: Incendies
plot: A woman and her brother discover devastating truths about their deceased mother's past.

title: Oldboy
plot: A man is released from prison after 15 years and seeks revenge against those who imprisoned him.

title: The Sting
plot: Two con artists plan an elaborate revenge scheme against a crime boss.

title: Stand by Me
plot: Four boys go on a journey to find the dead body of a missing boy.

title: Crash
plot: Multiple storylines of racial tensions and redemption in Los Angeles collide.

title: The Big Lebowski
plot: An unemployed drifter, mistaken for a millionaire, becomes embroiled in a kidnapping plot.

title: Metropolis
plot: In a futuristic city, a visionary leader and a working-class reformer challenge the status quo.

title: Singin' in the Rain
plot: A silent film star must convince his estranged partner to help him rework an upcoming musical.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
plot: Two siblings struggle to survive in Japan during the final months of World War II.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
plot: A charismatic fraudster takes over a firm and commences his lucrative scheme in the 1980s.

title: Ran
plot: A Japanese warlord divides his kingdom among his sons, leading to betrayal and warfare.

title: L.A. Confidential
plot: Three detectives investigate a series of murders in 1950s Los Angeles.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
plot: A man undergoes memory-erasing surgery to forget his ex-girlfriend.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his partners.

title: Blue is the Warmest Color
plot: Ad√®le is a vibrant girl of 15 whose life changes dramatically when she meets Emma, a free-spirited woman with blue hair, and they begin an intense relationship that challenges both their worldviews and futures.

title: Winter Sleep
plot: A retired actor and his wife face unexpected turmoil when a young man arrives at their remote hotel with a violent past, forcing them to confront their values and the consequences of charity and judgment.

title: Climates
plot: A successful television director and his wife's seemingly perfect marriage begins to unravel as they travel through Turkey. Their relationship deteriorates through small moments and unspoken resentments in a landscape both beautiful and isolating.

title: Three Monkeys
plot: A man agrees to take the blame for a car accident involving his employer, believing his family will be taken care of. Years later, when he is released from prison, he discovers how betrayal and sacrifice have corrupted those he loved.

title: Distant
plot: An isolated photographer and a newly unemployed man from Ankara living on his couch gradually reveal their loneliness and disconnection from the world around them in Istanbul, exploring themes of urban alienation and human indifference.

title: Clouds of May
plot: A young man returns to his village in Anatolia after studying filmmaking in the city, attempting to make a documentary about rural life while confronting his past and the resistance of the villagers to his ambitious vision.

title: Small Town
plot: A man returns to his small hometown to bury his father, only to discover that his family and the town itself have changed in unexpected ways, forcing him to confront memories and his estrangement from his origins.

title: The Cow
plot: A simple tale of a cow and its owner becomes a profound meditation on attachment, loss, and the cycles of rural life in Anatolia, exploring how seemingly mundane events reveal deeper truths about human existence.

title: Fire
plot: A poetic short film exploring the relationship between fire and memory, light and darkness, drawing parallels between the natural world and the inner landscapes of human emotion and consciousness.

title: A Fine Line
plot: An experimental documentary-like narrative that blurs the boundaries between fiction and reality, exploring the filmmaker's own relationship with cinema and the villages of Anatolia through observation and philosophical inquiry.

title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
plot: A group of men drive through the Anatolian countryside at night, searching for a dead man's grave. What emerges is a meditation on morality, guilt, and the human condition through carefully observed moments and philosophical conversations.
